claims.claim: Formerly incarcerated individuals face significant challenges adapting to modern technology.
claims.quote: I did almost 30 years and so I didn't have the advantage of growing up and like every new thing that advanced [...] Three year olds can do stuff better than me

claims.claim: Lack of technology skills can lead to unemployment for formerly incarcerated individuals.
claims.quote: I, I could have 10 one-on-ones in the time it take me to do one report for one, one-on-one, because that's how bad I suck at trying to put stuff in the computer.

claims.claim: There is a need for pre-release training in technology for incarcerated individuals.
claims.quote: Because if you have somebody that's locked up for decades coming home and you don't give them no pre-training with any kind of technology, you are setting them up for failure.

claims.claim: Difficulty with technology contributes to recidivism among formerly incarcerated individuals.
claims.quote: It's like almost like why recidivism even exists at this point. Because if you have somebody that's locked up for decades coming home and you don't give them no pre-training with any kind of technology, you are setting them up for failure.
